mapper.select: SELECT HEADNO , HNAME, HEAD_MGR, DELFLAG FROM HEADQUARTERS h ORDER BY HNAME
SELECT h.HEADNO , h.HNAME, h.HEAD_MGR, d.DNAME, d.DEPTNO, d.DEPT_MGR FROM HEADQUARTERS h LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT d ON h.HEADNO = d.HEADNO WHERE h.HEADNO = #{headno} AND d.DELFLAG = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE HEADQUARTERS SET HNAME = #{hname} WHERE HEADNO = #{headno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HEADQUARTERS (HEADNO, HNAME) VALUES (LPAD((SELECT MAX(HEADNO) FROM HEADQUARTERS h)+1,2,'0'), #{hname})
mapper.update: UPDATE HEADQUARTERS SET HEAD_MGR = '' WHERE HEAD_MGR = #{id} AND (SELECT "POSITION" FROM EMPLOYEE e WHERE "POSITION" = '02' AND ID = #{id} AND ESTATUS = 'N') IS NOT NULL

UPDATE EMPLOYEE SET "POSITION"= CASE WHEN ID = #{id} THEN '02' WHEN ID = (SELECT HEAD_MGR FROM HEADQUARTERS h WHERE HEADNO = #{headno}) THEN NULL ELSE "POSITION" END WHERE ID IN (#{id},(SELECT HEAD_MGR FROM HEADQUARTERS h WHERE HEADNO = #{headno}))
UPDATE HEADQUARTERS SET HEAD_MGR = #{id} WHERE HEADNO = #{headno}
UPDATE HEADQUARTERS SET DELFLAG ='Y' WHERE (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DEPARTMENT d WHERE HEADNO = #{headno}) < 1 AND HEADNO = #{headno} AND HEAD_MGR IS NULL
